name: Retronomicon
description:
Retronomicon is a puzzle arcade game.

Players can create, share and play levels in a neon synthwave world. 

Levels reacts in real time to the original and licensed synthwave music tracks.

Guide the ball from the spawn to the goal sounds easy enough. 

The challenge however, is to make it there with the highest score possible.

Use the prediction line to set the DROP. 

Keep the ball moving to get the high score and leave your name on user created levels. 

Master the chaos - Play, Create and Share the Retronomicon!

Visit Retronomicon.games 

Also on the google play store : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ProjectObtuse.Retronomicon
